articles.title: Biden to champion democracy in first foreign trip - CNA
articles.description: Joe Biden will fight what he calls a "defining" battle for democracy on his first foreign presidential trip, meeting top US allies in Europe ahead of a tricky summit with Russia's Vladimir Putin.
